name: Ubek
overview: A polish First Person Shooter, released in 1995 on Commodore Amiga. The game is now freely available, along with the sources, online with the author's permission. Ubek is a first person perspective shooter. As a best agent of the Safety Authority (UB) You have been chosen by the KGB for sabotage actions on the territory of America. Your first mission is to break through the enemy defense system in order to reach the secret base. The game consists all typical features of the genre and that includes a few types of weapons, using power ups (first aid kit, vodka), secret chambers, gold treasures, using items and others.
